fields.description: The label of the Account record type that's being mapped.
fields.label: Account Record Type

fields.description: The role to set on the Program Enrollment record that's automatically created if Auto Program Enrollment is selected.
fields.label: Auto Enrollment Role

fields.description: The status to set on the Program Enrollment record that's automatically created if Auto Program Enrollment is selected.
fields.label: Auto Enrollment Status

fields.description: If selected, a Program Enrollment record is auto created when a user creates an Affiliation record with an Account of this record type.
fields.inlineHelpText: If checked, a Program Enrollment record will be automatically created when the user creates an Affiliation to an Account of this type.
fields.label: Auto Enrollment

fields.description: The label of the Contact field that holds the value of the primary Account for this record type.
fields.inlineHelpText: The label of the lookup field in Contact that points to the primary Account of the specified Record Type.
fields.label: Primary Affl Field
